summary: Utility module that implements a class for discovering local administrator accounts on a Windows host. It establishes DCE/RPC connections to the LSAD, LSAT, and SAMR services, extracts the security identifiers of members of the local Administrators group, and translates those SIDs into readable account names.
business_intent: Enable security professionals and penetration testers to identify privileged user accounts on target machines, facilitating privilege analysis and potential escalation during security assessments.
